desc.p: The key of the SECS.UNAUTH file is made up of six elements separated by dots. These elements are; Portfolio Number Security Number Depository Nominee Code Maturity Date Interest Rate
Note ; The key of this record mimics the key of the SECURITY.POSITION file.
This field indicates whether the unauthorised security deal pointed by the above SECURITY.TRANS.ID field was a result of a deal being 'INPUT' or a deal being 'REVERSED'.
This field contains the id of the SECURITY.TRANS record that is unauthorised on the system.
